settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make your theme customizable.

settings.label: Comma separated list of nav menu items that should be bolded/highlighted. These must be entered exactly as they are in the Nav settings. (Items are caps sensitive.)
MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action)

settings.label: Breadcrumb Bottom Border Color
settings.info: Default Value: #ebebeb, show in collection page

settings.label: Show all / Only a few categories
List of categories
settings.info: Use "," to separate categories items if you have multiple categories. For ex: Shop, Collections

settings.label: Enable
settings.info: User can select multiple colors (size, brand...) or only one color (size, brand...)?

settings.label: Shop by tags 2 list
settings.info: Separate by a comma, i.e "XS, S, M, L, XL".

settings.label: Comma separated list of nav menu items that should hide product reviews. These must be entered exactly as they are in the Nav settings. (Items are caps sensitive.)
Resize image?
settings.info: If your images don't have the same size, pleases turn on resize image to have better look.

settings.label: Enable product sale off on Home Page?
Enable product sale off 2 on Home Page?
Allow shopper to see prices in his own currency?

settings.content: Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Allow customers to add notes to their order?
settings.info: Only enabled in the ajax cart if you use your cart.liquid markup. See docs below.

settings.content: used for Level Top Menu, Header Top, Page Title, Block Title, Button Text

settings.label: Add button text
settings.default: Yes, add this to my order

settings.label: Remove button text
settings.default: No, remove this from my order
